@package drasil-system

-- | Define types and functions related to creating a system information
--   database.
module System.Drasil.System

-- | Data structure for holding all of the requisite information about a
--   system to be used in artifact generation.
data System
[SI] :: (CommonIdea a, Idea a, Idea b, Quantity e, Eq e, MayHaveUnit e, Quantity h, MayHaveUnit h, Quantity i, MayHaveUnit i, HasUID j, Constrained j) => a -> b -> People -> Purpose -> Background -> Scope -> Motivation -> [e] -> [InstanceModel] -> [DataDefinition] -> [String] -> [h] -> [i] -> [j] -> [ConstQDef] -> ChunkDB -> ChunkDB -> System
class HasSystem c_a8jS
system :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS System
authors :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS People
background :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS Background
configFiles :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS [String]
constants :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS [ConstQDef]
datadefs :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS [DataDefinition]
instModels :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS [InstanceModel]
motivation :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS Motivation
purpose :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS Purpose
scope :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS Scope
systemdb :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS ChunkDB
usedinfodb :: HasSystem c_a8jS => Lens' c_a8jS ChunkDB

-- | Project Example purpose.
type Purpose = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example background information, used in the <tt>What</tt>
--   section of README.
type Background = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example scope.
type Scope = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example motivation.
type Motivation = [Sentence]
instance System.Drasil.System.HasSystem System.Drasil.System.System

module System.Drasil

-- | Data structure for holding all of the requisite information about a
--   system to be used in artifact generation.
